3: With the help of the Gray Ravens, I successfully defeated Camu.
I understood his purpose of existence, as well as mine...
—Deep within Kamui's memories trickled words unbeknownst to others.
Though we disagreed and fought a lot, we also helped each other.
You will continue onwards, to realize your ideals and your beliefs.
...And I will return to you, bearing your joy, your wrath.
I will watch over you always.
I guess, having a nagging idiot around sometimes isn't such a bad thing.
